All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccessLevel
Enumerates various access levels with priorities for comparison.
BackupTools
A set of tools for creating a backup
CommandAccessLevel
An annotation that indicates the required access level for a user.
CommandChatReturn
An annotation that provides the text to be output to chat when the command is used
CommandExecutionScope
An annotation to specify the scope where a command can be executed.
CommandName
An annotation that includes the name of the command (without slashes or other prefixes)
CommandScope
Enumerates the scopes where a command can be executed.
CommandsManager
A set of tools for handling custom commands
ComponentWidget
A basic UI widget template that is a component of the main ScreenWidget
Configuration
A set of tools for creating plugin configuration files
Constants
Set of main fluxloader constants
Core
FluxLoader Core
Core
FluxLoader Core
EventManager
Event calling and subscription system
EventsHandler
Client event handler
EventsHandler
Server events handler
FluxLogoState
New state when starting the game - showing the bootloader logo
ICommand
Interface for implementing a new command.
IControlsWidget
Class template for implementing plugin controls
Installer
Mod loader installation tools
IPlugin
Base class of all loader plugins
IWidget
Basic template for custom interface elements.
JarTools
A set of tools for working with Jar archives
Logger
A set of tools to simplify logging
Main
Main application class
MainMenuButton
Implementation of a button to open the plugin control panel
Metadata
The Metadata class represents plugin data loaded from the metadata.json file.
PlayerUtils
A set of tools for player management, monitoring and analysis
Plugin
Base class of all plugins
PluginClassLoader
A custom class loader for loading plugin classes.
PluginManager
Plugin (mod) management system
PluginMenu
Plugin management menu
ScreenWidget
A basic UI widget class that can be added to display on screen independently of other widgets
ServerUtils
A set of tools for server management
StateManager
Game state manager
SubscribeEvent
Subscription to in-game and user events
SubscribeSingleEvent
Subscription to user events
TextTools
A set of tools for manipulating text and rendering it
VersionChecker
Version checking toolkit
WidgetManager
Custom UI management system
